#summary Instructions for referencing these repositories from your project.
#labels Featured

It is generally not necessary to reference the release repository directly because it is mirrored with the central repository.  However, you can still reference the release repository directly from your Maven project if you would like.  Simply add the following element to the `<repositories>` section of either your `pom.xml` or `settings.xml`.

{{{
<repository>
  <id>google-maven-repository</id>
  <name>Google Maven Repository</name>
  <url>http://google-maven-repository.googlecode.com/svn/repository/</url>
</repository>
}}}

The snapshot repository _is not_ mirrored with the central repository.  Add the following snippet to reference that repository.

{{{
<repository>
  <id>google-maven-snapshot-repository</id>
  <name>Google Maven Snapshot Repository</name>
  <url>http://google-maven-repository.googlecode.com/svn/snapshot-repository/</url>
  <snapshots>
    <enabled>true</enabled>
  </snapshots>
</repository>
}}}
